trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time view of data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDesignerDataSourceView"></xref> class with the provided data source designer and view name.
The parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner"></xref> object.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)"></xref> method.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)"></xref> method is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert(System.Collections.IDictionary)"></xref> method.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteInsert(System.Collections.IDictionary)"></xref> method is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports paging through the data that is retrieved by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)"></xref> method.

`true` if paging through the data that is retrieved by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)"></xref> method is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports a sorted view of the underlying data source.
`true` if a sorted view of the underlying data source is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)"></xref> method.

`true` if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)"></xref> method is supported; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control by using the specified number of rows.
Returns a value that indicates whether the data is sample or real data.
The minimum number of rows to return.
`true` to indicate that the returned data is sample data; `false` to indicate that the returned data is live data.
The data to display at design time.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType"></xref> property contains an object that derives from <xref href="System.Data.Linq.DataContext"></xref>.

`true` if the object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType"></xref> property is derived from <xref href="System.Data.Linq.DataContext"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName"></xref> property returns a <xref href="System.Data.Linq.Table`1"></xref> type.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName"></xref> property returns a <xref href="System.Data.Linq.Table`1"></xref> type; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the schema that describes the data source view that is represented by the current view object.
An object that represents the schema.
